name: BBJ's
description:
Story:

You are the new security guard at BBJ's, Caleb Evans. BBJ's is a magical place where play and imagination come to life! With tasty burgers, animatronic mascots and happy music, you should have a good time here! The animatronics are a little creepy though, but I'm sure nothing could possibly go wrong, right?

Links:

Gamejolt Community: https://gamejolt.com/c/bbjs-tircat

Discord Server: https://discord.gg/DT3JW8Y5vw

for the original Five Nights at Freddy's®.

Softwares used:

Images rendered and modeled in blender V.3.0.

Game developed in and packaged by Turbowarp.
